solution_line_template: Instead of ${original_price} each, an Uno Giant Family Card costs ${original_price} - ${discount_per_card} = $<<{original_price}-{discount_per_card}={discounted_price}>>{discounted_price} each.
Ivan paid ${discounted_price} x {num_cards} = $<<{discounted_price}*{num_cards}={total_paid}>>{total_paid} for the ten pieces Uno Giant Family Card.
